experience: You and Shane both know Tom O'Neill, Jerami Tainter, and 10 others

Less than 2 months ago I didn't know anything about AWS. While looking for online resources to further develop my IT skills and explore new technologies, I found A Cloud Guru and Linux Academy. What a great discovery! I've learned a lot in the past weeks, and more importantly, having heaps of fun! Today AWS is just a hobby, however, I'm excited to follow my journey, I'm very hungry to learn more.
Many thanks to Anthony James, Thomas Haslett, Christophe Limpalair... for the brilliant content at linuxacademy.com and cloudassessments.com. The Orion Papers are fantastic, well done Tom!
I'm also very grateful to Ryan Kroonenburg and all mates from acloud.guru. Your lectures are enjoyable, easy to follow, and very relevant. Such a privilege to learn with THE Cloud Guru : )
I'm sure you all are changing the world for better by providing high standard education at extremely affordable prices. Keep disrupting, see you in the next classes!

Microsoft Certified Database Administrator Program: A+ Hardware/OS, Windows 2000 Server Administration/Infrastructure, Cisco Network Analysis, SQL Server Administration, Unix/Linux Server Administration.

http://overnightwebsitechallenge.com/Participated in the Nerdery Overnight Web Challenge, creating a site for a non-profit organization in a 24 hours time period. Was responsible for base architecture and JavaScript.

Renee Vorbeck
Seeking new challenges in business analysis, product and software support.
June 6, 2017, Shane worked with Renee in different groups

I cannot speak highly enough about Renee's work ethic and abilities. Renee and I have worked on several projects together and every time I'm amazed by her ability to easily orchestrate a team of individuals towards a business goal. Weeding through customer requests she adeptly determines the actual client need, and properly leverages her teammates to address their business problem in an efficient and pragmatic manner. During this process she strives to learn all she can from the rest of her team to not only be more prepared for the next issue but also to build solid relationships internally.I'm truly going to miss Renee's business focus and selfless nature, and wish her nothing but the best going forward. Anyone would be lucky to have Renee as part of their team.

Leah Comfort, CSM
Senior Technical Program Manager at Questar Assessment Inc.
June 5, 2017, Shane reported directly to Leah

Leah's ability to manage a group into organic collaboration and understanding are second to none. She orchestrates a team through inclusion and empowerment, allowing the individuals to leverage their strengths for the greater good of the goal at hand. She believes everyone's approach has value, and properly aligns those approaches to create impactful quality results for clients and the participating individuals alike. Leah has taught me the importance of taking everyones view into consideration, and how to assist in fostering those individuals towards success.

summary: * Experienced leader inside and out of the software development industry. Focused on aligning teams to client outcomes, maintaining organizational consistency, increasing efficiency, and promoting innovation.* Concentrated effort towards minimizing organizational and operational surprises through clear, consistent and personalized communication. Promotes a high level of team productivity and cohesion even while stationed remotely.* Positive client outcomes from a technology agnostic approach. Focusing on the need of the project, client, and business over the specifics of the technology.* Patient and focused on long-term client benefits during high pressure situations and time constraints, ensuring the success of otherwise adverse project outcomes.* Resource of excellence, organization, and accountability in the technology industry as a remote developer. Mentor and strategist of positive company impact for remote developers and supporting programs.
